definition: The sixth month of the year, typically associated with the arrival of summer and warmer weather. It is commonly referenced in relation to seasonal activities, events, and holidays.

examples.german: Im Juni fahren wir in den Urlaub.
examples.english: In June we go on vacation.

examples.german: Juni ist der sechste Monat des Jahres.
examples.english: June is the sixth month of the year.

examples.german: Juni ist ein beliebter Monat für Hochzeiten.
examples.english: June is a popular month for weddings.
